sentences.english: A mallard suddenly took wing, rising steeply into the air with an angry squawk .
sentences.chinese: 一只绿头鸭突然飞起，愤怒地尖鸣一声直冲天空。

sentences.english: Charlotte, what's this mallard doing here?
sentences.chinese: 这只绿头鸭怎么会在这里？

sentences.english: Slowly but surely one little mallard was struggling to make its way to the world.
sentences.chinese: 一只小绿头鸭正缓慢但坚定地挣扎着来到这个世界上。
